item.title: 今日巴西五大热点话题
item.description: 根据会议记录，Copom 将中性利率假设上调至 4.75%。Gabriel Galípolo 在今天上午的一次活动中发表讲话。此外，财政部将举行固定利率后拍卖，国内税收署将公布 5 月份税收情况。铁矿石上涨。查看要点：【原文：Copom eleva hipótese de taxa neutra para 4,75%, segundo ata. Gabriel Galípolo fala em evento nesta manhã. Ainda na agenda, Tesouro faz leilão de pós-fixados e Receita divulga arrecadação de maio. Minério de ferro sobe. Veja os destaques:】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油出口因港口工程创三个月最大降幅
item.description:
上周有四天没有货物离开普里莫尔斯克或科兹米诺

。【原文：

No cargoes left Primorsk or Kozmino for four days last week

】

item.title: 制裁俄罗斯油轮将提高莫斯科的成本
item.description:
西方行动造成的不确定性可能会促使克里姆林宫的剩余客户要求更高的折扣。【原文：

The uncertainty created by the West’s actions may prompt the Kremlin’s remaining customers to demand steeper discounts.

】

item.title: Innovent公司的肥胖症药物与礼来公司的减肥药效果相似
item.description: 由中国创新生物公司和礼来公司共同开发的一种新型肥胖症药物在后期试验中显示出显著的减肥效果，为其在中国获批上市与诺和诺德公司的大片药物竞争铺平了道路。【原文：A new obesity drug co-developed by China’s Innovent Biologics Inc. and Eli Lilly & Co. has demonstrated significant weight loss in a late stage trial, paying the way for its approval in the country to compete with the blockbuster from Novo Nordisk A/S.】

item.title: 法国基金经理在股市暴跌后寻求避险良机
item.description: 在经历了 2,000 亿美元的全军覆没后，法国股市仍显得十分脆弱，但一些投资者正在寻找能够抵御大选相关风险的低价股。【原文：French stocks are still looking fragile after a $200 billion wipeout, but some investors are seeking out bargains that can withstand election-related risks.】

item.title: 如果国家支持的贷款不能延期，越南航空将面临破产风险
item.description: 据越南国会网站上的一份声明称，如果政府支持的贷款的偿还期限不延长，越南航空股份公司（Vietnam Airlines JSC）将面临最早于 7 月破产的风险。【原文：National carrier Vietnam Airlines JSC risks insolvency as early as July if the repayment deadline for a government-backed loan isn’t extended, according to a statement on the National Assembly’s website.】

item.title: 对冲基金看好英国大选信心增强
item.description: 对冲基金对英国越来越乐观，将英镑走强的押注提高到了九个月来的最高点，希望即将举行的大选将巩固英国向更加稳定的中间派政策的转变。【原文：Hedge funds are increasingly optimistic about the UK, boosting bets for a stronger pound to the highest in nine months on hopes that the upcoming election will cement the country’s shift to more stable, centrist policies.】

item.title: 国际清算银行（BIS）称，人工智能是央行提升自身水平的挑战
item.description: 国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）表示，各国央行必须更好地掌握人工智能技术，以评估其对经济的影响，并为自己所用。【原文：Central banks must get a better grip on artificial intelligence both to gauge its economic impact and to harness the technology for themselves, the Bank for International Settlements said.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼警告通胀面临上行风险，现在还不是减息的时候
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）表示，她认为通胀前景面临一些上行风险，并重申有必要在一段时间内保持借贷成本的高位。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman said she sees a number of upside risks to the inflation outlook, and reiterated the need to keep borrowing costs elevated for some time.】

item.title: 资产支持债券市场助推全球人工智能热潮
item.description: 人工智能革命的资金越来越多地来自债务市场中一个鲜为人知的领域。【原文：The AI revolution is increasingly being funded in a little-watched part of the debt market.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。世界上一些最热门的行业摇摇欲坠，空中客车公司在发布盈利预警后大幅下跌。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Some of the world’s hottest trades are faltering, and Airbus falls sharply after issuing a profit warning. Here’s what’s moving markets. — David Goodman】

item.title: 汉莎航空将向航班收取高达 72 欧元的清洁燃料成本费
item.description: 欧洲最大的航空集团德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）明年将对每次飞行征收高达 72 欧元（77 美元）的附加费，以支付为降低飞机排放所需的替代燃料不断上涨的成本。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG, Europe’s biggest airline group, will introduce a surcharge of up to €72 ($77) per flight next year to cover the rising costs of alternative fuels needed to lower aircraft emissions.】

item.title: 马克龙分心，德国停止推动欧盟联合举债
item.description: 德国政府及其盟友成功地阻止了为国防等欧盟关键项目提供资金的新联合借款计划。【原文：The German government and its allies are succeeding in their efforts to block plans for new joint borrowing to finance critical European Union projects like defense.】

item.title: 欧洲首次公开募股涨势不减，上市复兴开始衰退
item.description: 今年上半年上市的欧洲公司表现亮眼，超过了整个股票市场。【原文：European companies that went public in the first half of this year have made a bright start, outpacing the broader equity market.】

item.title: 法国债券暗示大选前投资者神经趋于平静
item.description: 法国债券的利差从十多年来的最高水平回落，这表明投资者对周日开始的临时议会选举可能造成的混乱更加乐观。【原文：Spreads on French bonds retreated from the highest level in over a decade, in a sign investors are becoming more sanguine about potential disruption at a snap parliamentary election that begins Sunday.】

item.title: 诺和诺德的减肥药 Wegovy 在中国获批上市
item.description: 中国已经批准了诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）用于慢性体重控制的大片药物 Wegovy，从而开启了世界第二大经济体对新一代肥胖症药物的竞争。【原文：China has approved Novo Nordisk A/S’s blockbuster Wegovy for chronic weight management, opening up competition for next-generation obesity drugs in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 据说阿尔诺收购了卡地亚所有者历峰集团的股份
item.description: 据熟悉这位法国亿万富翁投资情况的人士透露，伯纳德-阿诺特（Bernard Arnault）已以个人名义入股卡地亚母公司历峰集团（Richemont）。【原文：Bernard Arnault has taken a personal equity stake in Cartier parent company Richemont, according to people familiar with the French billionaire’s investments.】

item.title: 英伟达最新解禁令沸腾期权交易褪色
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s correction has volumes in shares and options turning upside down.】

item.title: Signa 创始人本科的住所在欺诈案调查中被警方搜查
item.description: 作为欺诈调查的一部分，奥地利检察官突袭了 Signa 创始人 Rene Benko 的住所及其破产公司的总部。【原文：Austrian prosecutors raided the home of Signa founder Rene Benko and his insolvent company’s headquarters as part of a fraud investigation.】

item.title: 阿联酋将追随海湾邻国发行 9 月以来首支欧洲债券
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国自 9 月份以来首次出售欧元债券，为投资者提供 10 年期美元债务。【原文：The United Arab Emirates is selling its first eurobonds since September, offering investors 10-year dollar debt.】

item.title: 英国葡萄酒酿造商 Chapel Down 为资助发展计划兜售葡萄酒
item.description: 英国葡萄酒制造商 Chapel Down Group Plc 正在启动一项战略审查，可能会出售公司，以寻求长期发展的资金来源。【原文：English winemaker Chapel Down Group Plc is kicking off a strategic review that may result in a sale of the company as it seeks ways to fund longer-term growth.】

item.title: 土耳其对欧盟谈判的失望促使其向金砖国家伸出橄榄枝
item.description: 土耳其已向包括俄罗斯和中国在内的主要新兴国家组成的金砖国家俱乐部伸出了橄榄枝，这表明土耳其对加入欧盟的谈判缺乏进展日益感到沮丧。【原文：Turkey has reached out to the BRICS club of major emerging nations that includes Russia and China, in a sign of growing frustration over a lack of progress in talks to join the European Union.】

item.title: 肯尼亚立法者同意取消计划征收的 2.5% 机动车税
item.description: 肯尼亚立法者投票反对征收 2.5% 机动车税的提案，这是在东非国家引发街头抗议的新税收措施之一。【原文：Kenyan lawmakers voted against a proposal to introduce a 2.5% motor vehicle levy, one of new tax measures that have led to street protests in the East African nation.】

item.title: 彭博社法国民意调查：极右翼勒庞的领先优势扩大
item.description: 根据彭博社的民意调查，玛丽娜-勒庞领导的极右翼国民阵线在周日举行的法国临时立法选举第一轮投票前扩大了领先优势，而其竞争对手的势头正在减弱。【原文：Marine Le Pen’s far-right National Rally has widened its lead ahead of the first round of France’s snap legislative election on Sunday while its rivals are losing momentum, according to Bloomberg’s poll of polls.】

item.title: 瑞银从德意志银行和汇丰银行挖走 10 名银行家以加强中东地区业务
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）从德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）和汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）招聘了三名高级员工，以壮大其在中东地区的财富管理团队。【原文：UBS Group AG is growing its wealth management team in the Middle East with three senior hires from Deutsche Bank AG and HSBC Holdings Plc.】

item.title: 德意志银行称，信贷比美国国债更安全
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）私人银行部门表示，鉴于美国财政前景不乐观，预计赤字将继续增加，美国投资级信贷似乎比国债更值得投资。【原文：US investment-grade credit appears to be a better bet than Treasuries given America’s downbeat fiscal outlook with deficits projected to plow higher, according to Deutsche Bank AG’s private banking arm.】

item.title: 欧陆粉拒绝浑水公司的说法，称报告 "不准确
item.description: 欧陆科学 SE 拒绝了卡森-布洛克（Carson Block）的浑水研究公司（Muddy Waters Research）本周早些时候提出的指控。【原文：Eurofins Scientific SE rejected allegations made by Carson Block’s Muddy Waters Research earlier this week.】

item.title: 明星量化基金资产跃升 38650% 受到印度调查的威胁
item.description: 量化共同基金近年来在印度市场掀起了一场风暴，它利用计算机模型创造了 560% 的回报率，使资产增长了近 400 倍。这一惊人的增长在印度最新的监管调查中受到了威胁。【原文：Quant Mutual Fund took India’s market by storm in recent years, using computer models to generate 560% returns and boost assets by almost 400-fold. That spectacular growth is under threat in India’s latest regulatory probe.】

item.title: 安联称法国债券持有人担心欧债危机重演
item.description: 安联全球投资公司（Allianz Global Investors）的多资产首席投资官表示，法国官员必须向外国投资者保证该国的财政状况良好，否则将面临债券利差再次暴跌的风险。【原文：French officials must reassure foreign investors that the nation’s finances are in order or risk a fresh blowout in bond spreads, according to Allianz Global Investors’ multi-asset chief investment officer.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国大选承诺令吉尔伯特成为焦点
item.description: 伦敦城。摄影师：Jason Alden/Bloomberg【原文：The City of London. Photographer: Jason Alden/Bloomberg】
